title: Cushion Cover, 1610–30
medium:
Medium: wool, silk
Technique: tapestry woven
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: The story of David and Abishag with two women each holding a jug, a man on horseback and another standing behind. Landscape in background and a floral border.
